name: recross
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to go across from one side of something to the other for a second, third, etc. time: They had to cross and re-cross a stream to get there. The new program will not deter desperate refugees from attempting to recross the border. recross your legs/arms
to change your leg or arm position so that a different leg or arm is on the top from the one that was on top previously: We often cross and recross our legs to change sitting position.
